attributes.name: Campaign Manager
attributes.summary:
## Overview
Create a comprehensive Campaign Manager card for marketing campaign planning, execution, and tracking in the Boxel framework. This card should enable marketing teams to orchestrate multi-channel campaigns, track performance metrics, and optimize marketing investments through data-driven insights.

## Core Fields

### Campaign Information
- **campaignName**: StringField - Campaign title
- **campaignCode**: StringField - Unique identifier (format: CAMP-YYYY-MM-NNN)
- **campaignType**: StringField with enum: "brand-awareness", "lead-generation", "product-launch", "seasonal", "retention", "acquisition"
- **status**: StringField with enum: "planning", "approved", "active", "paused", "completed", "archived"
- **priority**: StringField - High, Medium, Low
- **tags**: containsMany(StringField) - Campaign categorization

### Campaign Details
- **objective**: MarkdownField - Campaign goals and KPIs
- **targetAudience**: contains(AudienceSegment) - Detailed audience definition
- **messaging**: contains(CampaignMessaging) - Key messages and value props
- **creativeGuidelines**: MarkdownField - Brand and creative direction
- **competitiveContext**: MarkdownField - Competitive landscape analysis

### Timeline & Budget
- **startDate**: DateField - Campaign launch date
- **endDate**: DateField - Campaign end date
- **budget**: NumberField - Total campaign budget
- **budgetBreakdown**: containsMany(BudgetAllocation) - Budget by channel
- **milestones**: containsMany(CampaignMilestone) - Key dates and deliverables
- **flightSchedule**: contains(FlightSchedule) - Media flight dates

### Channels & Tactics
- **channels**: containsMany(MarketingChannel) - Selected marketing channels
- **emailCampaigns**: linksToMany(EmailCampaign) - Email marketing components
- **socialPosts**: linksToMany(SocialPost) - Social media content
- **paidAds**: linksToMany(AdCampaign) - Paid advertising campaigns
- **contentAssets**: linksToMany(ContentAsset) - Blog posts, videos, etc.
- **landingPages**: linksToMany(LandingPage) - Campaign-specific pages

### Team & Workflow
- **campaignOwner**: linksTo(Contact) - Primary campaign manager
- **team**: containsMany(TeamAssignment) - Team members and roles
- **approvers**: linksToMany(Contact) - Approval chain
- **vendors**: linksToMany(Vendor) - External agencies/partners
- **tasks**: containsMany(CampaignTask) - Campaign to-do items

### Performance Metrics
- **targetMetrics**: containsMany(KPITarget) - Goal metrics
- **actualMetrics**: containsMany(MetricResult) - Real-time results
- **roi**: NumberField - Return on investment (computed)
- **conversionRate**: NumberField - Overall conversion rate (computed)
- **engagement**: contains(EngagementMetrics) - Likes, shares, comments
- **attribution**: contains(AttributionData) - Multi-touch attribution

## Required Component Cards

### MarketingChannel Card
Create a separate MarketingChannel card with:
- **channelType**: StringField - Email, Social, PPC, SEO, Content, etc.
- **platform**: StringField - Specific platform (Facebook, Google, etc.)
- **budget**: NumberField - Channel-specific budget
- **targetReach**: NumberField - Expected audience size
- **actualReach**: NumberField - Actual audience reached
- **spend**: NumberField - Actual spend to date
- **conversions**: NumberField - Channel conversions
- **cpa**: NumberField - Cost per acquisition (computed)
- **content**: linksToMany(Content) - Channel-specific content
- **schedule**: contains(ChannelSchedule) - Publishing calendar

### CampaignTask Card
- **taskName**: StringField - Task description
- **assignee**: linksTo(Contact) - Responsible person
- **dueDate**: DateField - Task deadline
- **status**: StringField - Not started, In progress, Complete
- **dependencies**: linksToMany(CampaignTask) - Prerequisite tasks
- **deliverables**: containsMany(FileField) - Task outputs

### KPITarget Card
- **metricName**: StringField - KPI name
- **targetValue**: NumberField - Goal value
- **currentValue**: NumberField - Actual value
- **unit**: StringField - Measurement unit
- **trackingMethod**: StringField - How to measure
- **reportingFrequency**: StringField - Daily, Weekly, Monthly

## Computed Fields Logic

### ROI Calculation
(Total Revenue Generated - Total Campaign Cost) / Total Campaign Cost × 100

### Overall Conversion Rate
Total Conversions across all channels / Total Reach × 100

### Budget Utilization
Sum of actual spend across all channels / Total budget × 100

### Campaign Performance Score
Weighted average of KPI achievement rates based on priority

## Card Layout Design

### Isolated/Embedded View Layout
Design a comprehensive campaign command center:

**Header Section**
- Campaign name with status badge
- Quick stats: Days remaining, Budget spent %, ROI
- Action buttons: Pause/Resume, Clone, Export
- Campaign timeline visualization

**Navigation Tabs**
- **Overview**: Campaign summary and key metrics
- **Channels**: Channel performance breakdown
- **Content**: Asset library and calendar
- **Analytics**: Detailed performance metrics
- **Team**: Task assignments and progress
- **Budget**: Financial tracking and forecasts

**Overview Dashboard**
- **Campaign Brief Panel**: Objectives, audience, messaging
- **Performance Gauges**: Visual KPI progress indicators
- **Channel Mix Chart**: Budget and performance by channel
- **Timeline View**: Gantt chart of campaign activities
- **Quick Wins**: Top performing elements

**Channel Management**
- **Channel Cards**: Performance summary per channel
- **Cross-channel Timeline**: Coordinated content calendar
- **A/B Test Results**: Test variant performance
- **Optimization Suggestions**: AI-powered recommendations

**Content Hub**
- **Asset Gallery**: Visual content browser
- **Content Calendar**: Publishing schedule
- **Approval Workflow**: Content review status
- **Version Control**: Asset revision history

**Analytics Dashboard**
- **Real-time Metrics**: Live performance data
- **Trend Charts**: Performance over time
- **Attribution Model**: Conversion path analysis
- **Cohort Analysis**: Audience segment performance
- **Competitive Benchmarks**: Industry comparisons

### Fitted View Layout
- Campaign name and type icon
- Status indicator with phase
- Mini performance gauges (Budget, ROI, Goals)
- Days remaining countdown
- Quick action buttons

## Interactive Features

### Real-time Updates
- Live metric refresh
- Push notifications for milestones
- Alert thresholds for KPIs
- Automated status updates

### Collaboration Tools
- @mentions in comments
- Task assignments
- Approval workflows
- Shared workspaces
- Activity feeds

### Planning Tools
- Budget allocation wizard
- Audience builder
- Content planner
- Channel selector
- ROI calculator

## Styling Requirements
- Modern marketing aesthetic
- Channel-specific color coding
- Data visualization focus
- Mobile-responsive design
- Print-ready reports
- Dark mode support
- Customizable dashboards
- Brand guideline compliance

## Validation Rules
- End date must be after start date
- Budget allocations cannot exceed total budget
- At least one channel must be selected
- KPI targets must have measurement methods
- Task dependencies cannot be circular
- Approval required for budget changes
- Channel budgets must sum to total or less

## Integration Points
- **Email Platforms**: Mailchimp, HubSpot, Klaviyo
- **Social Media**: Facebook Ads, LinkedIn, Twitter
- **Analytics**: Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics
- **Ad Platforms**: Google Ads, Facebook Business
- **CRM Systems**: Salesforce, HubSpot CRM
- **Content Management**: WordPress, Contentful
- **Design Tools**: Canva, Adobe Creative Cloud
- **Project Management**: Asana, Monday.com
- **Marketing Automation**: Marketo, Pardot
- **Attribution Tools**: Bizible, Attribution

## Business Logic Requirements
- Multi-touch attribution modeling
- Budget pacing algorithms
- Predictive performance modeling
- Automated bid optimization
- Content performance scoring
- Audience overlap analysis
- Campaign lift measurement
- Incrementality testing
- Media mix modeling
- Customer journey mapping
- Lead scoring integration
- Revenue attribution
- Competitive intelligence gathering
- Sentiment analysis integration
